Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.View.GUI

Class GUIController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.View.GUI.GUIController
All Implemented Interfaces:
SceneController, View, PropertyChangeListener, EventListener
public class GUIController extends Object implements View, SceneController
Class to manage the GUI
  • Start the GUI;
  • close the GUI;
  • change GUI's scene;
  • send message to the server;
  • received message from the server.
